notes: One of the elite deepling forces, along [[Deepling Master Librarian]] and [[Deepling Elite]]. The tyrant drops the same loot as a [[Deepling Guard]] (including [[Foxtail]]) although the drop rate for rares is slightly higher to accommodate the boosted health and strength of the tyrant. There are only 8 tyrant spawns in-game.
name: Deepling Tyrant
behaviour: Almost exactly the same as a [[Deepling Guard]], though it moves faster and deals more damage with each of its attacks.
location: [[Fiehonja]] ({{Mapper Coords|130.175|121.219|14|4|text=here}}, {{Mapper Coords|130.250|121.225|14|4|text=here}}, {{Mapper Coords|130.225|122.25|11|4|text=here}}, {{Mapper Coords|130.234|122.4|12|4|text=here}}, {{Mapper Coords|131.2|122.37|13|4|text=here}}, {{Mapper Coords|131.28|122.74|13|4|text=here}}, {{Mapper Coords|130.216|122.65|11|4|text=here}}, {{Mapper Coords|130.173|122.2|11|4|text=here}}).
strategy: Treat it as you would a [[Deepling Guard]]. Be aware that the tyrant has more than 2.5x the health of a deepling guard so the battle will inevitably be longer.
